original_title: Cracker Barrel unveils a controversial logo change | CNN Business
article_summary: Cracker Barrel unveils a new logo, dropping the barrel and man from its iconic emblem, as part of a $700 million transformation plan to modernize its image and attract new customers. The change has sparked controversy among some loyal fans and conservatives, who fear the 56-year-old chain is straying too far from its rural roots.</s>
